intro: Cynoglossum amplexicaule, commonly known as purple heart, is a flowering plant native to Europe, Asia, and North Africa. It is characterized by its striking violet to purple flowers and heart-shaped leaves that clasp the stems, giving it its scientific name. Cynoglossum amplexicaule is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and ease of care.
